name: Rachel Maclean - Mint Mi

{"name": "Rachel Maclean - Mint Mi 1/100", "description": "Rachel Maclean
Mint Mi, 2021
Digital Animation, NFT
Edition of 100

About the work

Mimi, celebrated Scottish video artist Rachel Macleanb�s latest protagonist, is a fairy-tale avatar of end-game Capitalism. She first appeared in a seemingly abandoned toy shop at the end of a dark woodland path at Jupiter Artland, Edinburgh, a mysterious doll who could flip consumerism on its head, figuratively and literally, in the artistb�s first permanent architectural installation.

Mimib�s story develops in upside mimi a4	I/a4	I/ uJop, a short film b� the artistb�s first fully animated work b� that has screened at Josh Lilley, London as part of That's not Mi!, Macleanb�s inaugural show with the gallery, as well as the London and Tempere International Film Festivals. 

You can purchase a bundle of b�mint mi,b� the digital video, and its physical counterpart, b�box mi,b�. Both the video and the doll are NFT-powered: tied to an NFT acting as their digital certificate of authenticity & ownership and making them unique on the blockchain.

About the artist

Rachel Maclean (b. 1987, Edinburgh, Scotland) creates video and installations that operate deep in rendered space and at the vanguard of modern life. In an unmistakable saccharine palette, Maclean's characters and settings refract and anticipate contemporary culture, whipping from the cutting to the cute, reflecting both the latent neurosis and bracing potential of life as a digital native.", "image": "ipfs://QmQ6TeoXMHqQDqQ4hFuKyE5QRV2zxYA7mj2VUwhU64hice?id=1", "animation_url": "ipfs://QmXsThZQu5BJ68NLQRAoeWNNE4NURdgXzjEWZEunq9g8dH?id=1", "properties": {"number": 1, "name": "Rachel Maclean - Mint Mi"}}
